rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {0004, 3426, 3447, 3870, 3965, M20022}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {SWK3080, SWK3400}
Must be enrolled in course version {0004, 3426, 3447, 3870, 3965, M20022}

description: Supervised Professional Practice 1 enables students to operationalise the professional social work role. The unit comprises 480 hours of supervised professional practice in the field and 20 hours of skills development and integration of theory and practice in the classroom and in the field. On campus students will attend placement briefings and integration sessions where their placement experiences will be critically reviewed in order to connect with social work knowledge and theory, while off-campus students will attend skills and integration sessions at compulsory workshops. Contact with the university liaison social worker allocated to the student and supervisor while on placement will also be opportunities to review skills and to facilitate the integration of theory and practice.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
